welcomeScreen.welcomeTitle: Hi! I'm my Proactive Lab AI
welcomeScreen.welcomeSubtitle: I'm here to help you understand your body better and achieve your wellness goals.
welcomeScreen.welcomeBackSubtitle: Ready for new wellness insights? Let's pick up where we left off.

dashboard.vitalScoreInfo: The Wellness Score is a synthetic index of your health status (0-100), calculated by analyzing biomarkers, risk factors, and lipid profile. A high score indicates excellent general health.
dashboard.nutritionStrategyInfo: These are your daily goals calculated based on your profile (TDEE, weight goal, etc.).
dashboard.allMealsEaten: You have consumed all meals for today. Great job!
dashboard.noPlanAlertMessage: There is no nutrition plan for today.
dashboard.dailyTip: Drinking water before meals helps hydration and digestion.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Plan
nutrition.caloriesInfo: TDEE is your total daily energy expenditure. Target calories are calculated to reach your goal (e.g., deficit for weight loss).
nutrition.macrosInfo: Indicates the ideal percentage of Protein, Carbs, and Fats in your diet. This breakdown is optimized based on your goals and physical condition.
nutrition.bmiInfo: BMI is an indicator that relates weight and height. Although it does not distinguish between fat and lean mass, it is a useful starting point for assessing healthy weight.
nutrition.aiGenerated: Generated by AI tailored for you
nutrition.regenerateAlertMessage: The weekly plan will be completely updated. This operation will take some time (even minutes). Are you sure you want to continue?
nutrition.generatePrompt: Generate a complete 7-day nutrition plan based on your analysis and goals.
nutrition.generatePlanPrompt: Generate a complete 7-day nutrition plan based on your analysis and goals.
nutrition.updateMessage:
We are analyzing your new profile and regenerating the nutrition plan tailored for you.

This operation requires a lot of computing power and can take up to 2 minutes.

You can close this window and continue using the app: the page will automatically update when finished.
nutrition.errorGenerate: Unable to generate nutrition plan at the moment. Please try again later.
nutrition.noPlanExport: Generate a nutrition plan first to print it.
nutrition.noPlanShopping: Generate a nutrition plan first to see the shopping list.
nutrition.noAnalysisError: Please upload an analysis first to generate a personalized nutrition plan.
nutrition.newAnalysisMessage: We detected a new analysis or profile update. Do you want to regenerate the nutrition plan to adapt to the new data?

newAnalysis.title: New Analysis Detected
newAnalysis.message:
Your clinical data has changed. Calorie calculations have been automatically updated.

Do you want to regenerate the weekly meal plan to adapt to the new results?

mealSwap.title: Swap Meal
mealSwap.subtitle: Choose an alternative for:
mealSwap.timeout: Timeout. Connection is slow, please try again.
mealSwap.error: Unable to generate alternatives at the moment. Please try again.
mealSwap.confirmMessage: Do you want to swap "%{old}" with "%{new}"?

strategies.strategyDisclaimer: My Proactive Lab AI is a Wellness/Lifestyle App and is not intended for medical use. Dietary suggestions are based on published nutritional correlations, not on clinical diagnostics.

mediterranean.description: The Mediterranean diet is considered one of the healthiest in the world. It is based on plant foods, healthy fats (olive oil), and moderate consumption of animal proteins.
mediterranean.reasoning:
This nutritional strategy was developed to optimize your energy levels and support your long-term well-being, respecting your dietary preferences.

We chose the Mediterranean Diet because it is rich in antioxidants and monounsaturated fats, ideal for improving cardiovascular health and reducing systemic inflammation.

keto.description: The Ketogenic diet drastically reduces carbohydrates to push the body to burn fat as the primary source of energy (ketosis).
keto.reasoning:
This nutritional strategy was developed to optimize your energy levels and support your long-term well-being, respecting your dietary preferences.

The Ketogenic Diet was selected to improve your insulin sensitivity and promote rapid fat oxidation, in line with your body composition goals.

vegetarian.description: The Vegetarian diet excludes meat and fish, focusing on plant foods, eggs, and dairy for a balanced intake.
vegetarian.reasoning:
This nutritional strategy was developed to optimize your energy levels and support your long-term well-being, respecting your dietary preferences.

We opted for a Vegetarian approach to reduce the load of saturated fats and increase the intake of fiber and phytonutrients, essential for regulating intestinal function and general well-being.

vegan.description: The Vegan diet excludes all animal products. It is rich in fiber and antioxidants, excellent for heart health.
vegan.reasoning:
This nutritional strategy was developed to optimize your energy levels and support your long-term well-being, respecting your dietary preferences.

The Vegan choice maximizes the intake of protective plant nutrients. It is particularly indicated for reducing oxidative stress and improving cardiovascular health.

paleo.description: The Paleo diet is inspired by the diet of our hunter-gatherer ancestors, excluding processed foods and grains.
paleo.reasoning:
This nutritional strategy was developed to optimize your energy levels and support your long-term well-being, respecting your dietary preferences.

The Paleo protocol was chosen to eliminate potential allergens and intestinal irritants (such as gluten and dairy), favoring a metabolic reset and a reduction in chronic inflammation.

balanced.description: A balanced diet personalized to support your general well-being and maintain constant energy levels.
balanced.reasoning:
This nutritional strategy was developed to optimize your energy levels and support your long-term well-being, respecting your dietary preferences.

We structured a Balanced plan to guarantee you a complete intake of macro and micronutrientes, ensuring optimal intake and supporting your active lifestyle.

hydration.title: Hydration
hydration.text: Drinking water before meals can help you feel full faster.

movement.title: Movement
movement.text: A 10-minute walk after eating helps regulate blood sugar.

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.text: Sleeping 7-8 hours a night is essential for muscle and mental recovery.

fiber.title: Fiber
fiber.text: Fiber aids digestion and keeps energy levels stable.

stress.title: Stress
stress.text: Chronic stress can negatively affect metabolism.

chewing.title: Chewing
chewing.text: Chewing slowly improves digestion and nutrient absorption.

quotes: Health is the first duty of life.
Take care of your body, it's the only place you have to live.
Happiness is the highest form of health.
Every day is a new opportunity to get better.
Wellness is not a destination, but a way of traveling.
Listen to your body, it speaks to you continuously.
Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
Calmness is the cradle of power.
A healthy body is a guest chamber for the soul.
Investing in health yields the best interest.

It is not a medical device and must not be used to diagnose, treat, or prevent diseases. Always consult a healthcare professional before making health decisions.

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.text1: This application uses Artificial Intelligence to provide analysis and suggestions based on user-provided data.
disclaimer.highlight: IT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.
disclaimer.text2: The information provided is for informational and general wellness purposes only. It does not constitute a medical diagnosis, treatment, or prescription in any way.
disclaimer.text3: Never replace your doctor's advice with information obtained from this app. If you have health concerns, always consult a healthcare professional.
disclaimer.text4: By continuing, you declare that you have read and understood that the use of this application is under your sole responsibility.
disclaimer.fullText:
# MEDICAL DISCLAIMER

## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT HEALTH WARNING

**PROACTIVE LAB IS NOT A DOCTOR AND IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.**

*   **Informational Purpose Only:** The content, analyses, and suggestions generated by this application (including those provided by Artificial Intelligence) are for informational and educational purposes only.
*   **Risk of Error:** Artificial Intelligence can make errors ("hallucinations"). Never consider the provided data as absolute truth. Always check the original values on your reports.
*   **Always Consult a Professional:** Do not make health decisions, change therapies, or ignore symptoms based on this app. Always consult your doctor or a specialist.
*   **Emergencies:** If you think you have a medical emergency, call your doctor or the emergency number (112/911) immediately.

By using this app, you declare that you understand that it does not replace professional medical judgment.

legal.privacyPolicy:
# PRIVACY POLICY

**Last Updated:** 10/12/2025

## 1. Data Controller

**EARTH'S DREAMS S.R.L.**
Stradela Carabus Nr. 15, Iasi, 700275, Romania
CUI: 38752272 (J22/39/07.01.2019) | VAT ID: RO38752272
Data Protection Contact: info@earthsdreams.ro

## 2. Introduction and Principles

Welcome to Proactive Lab ("the Application"). Your privacy is our top priority. We recognize the sensitive nature of health data and are committed to protecting it in full compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR - EU 2016/679).

This policy describes how we treat your data, based on the principles of Privacy by Design and Data Minimization.

## 3. Types of Data Processed

### A. Data entered by the user (Special Categories of Data - Art. 9 GDPR):
To provide the service, the app processes data that you voluntarily provide, such as:
*   **Personal and biometric data** (age, gender, height, weight).
*   **Health-related data** (biomarkers, symptoms, medical notes, clinical history).
*   **Visual documents** (photos of medical reports uploaded for OCR/AI analysis).

### B. Technical Data (Collected automatically):
*   Anonymized system logs and technical data strictly necessary for security, debugging, and app operation.
*   We do not use advertising trackers or third-party profiling cookies for marketing purposes.

### C. Payment and Subscription Data:
The Application offers in-app purchases or subscriptions. EARTH'S DREAMS S.R.L. does **NOT** collect, process, or store your financial data (credit card numbers, bank accounts).

All financial transactions are handled entirely by third parties: Apple (App Store) for iOS and Google (Play Store) for Android. We only receive an anonymous "token" from these providers confirming payment or subscription status (active/expired), without any reference to your financial identity.

## 4. "Zero-Knowledge" Architecture and Place of Processing

The Application operates on a "Local-First" model:

*   **Local Storage:** Your health and personal data are saved encrypted exclusively on your device's memory.
*   **No Proprietary Cloud:** Earth's Dreams S.R.L. does **NOT** own, manage, or have access to a central database containing your health data. We developers cannot see, read, or retrieve your data.
*   **Sovereignty:** In case of app deletion or device loss without backup (which is the user's responsibility), data is unrecoverable by us.

## 5. Use of Artificial Intelligence and Data Transfer

To provide advanced analysis features, the Application uses Google Gemini APIs (provided by Google Cloud Platform).

*   **Transmission Mode:** When you request an analysis, only the strictly necessary textual or numerical data (stripped of your name and surname, if possible) are sent encrypted (HTTPS/TLS) to Google servers.
*   **Data Usage Terms:** We use Google services in "Enterprise" mode. Under Google Cloud's current terms, your data is **NOT** used to train Google's Artificial Intelligence models and is not persistently stored by their systems.
*   **Role of Google:** Google acts as a Data Processor or Sub-processor for mere technical processing.

## 6. Legal Basis for Processing

The processing of your health data takes place exclusively on the basis of your **Explicit Consent** (Art. 9.2.a GDPR), which you provide upon first launching the app and which is necessary for service provision. You can revoke consent at any time by deleting data or uninstalling the app.

## 7. Rights of the Data Subject

In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
*   Access your data (all already visible on your device).
*   Rectify inaccurate data.
*   Delete data ("Right to be forgotten"): You can fully delete your data using the "Delete all data" function in app settings or by uninstalling the application. Since we do not keep copies on our servers, this action is final.
*   Limit processing or object to it.

## 8. Minors

The Application is intended exclusively for users aged 18 or older. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If we become aware of minors' data entered in the app, we invite parents to delete the app from the minor's device.

## 9. Changes

We reserve the right to update this policy. Substantial changes will be notified via the app.
legal.termsOfService:
# TERMS OF SERVICE (TOS)

**Last Updated:** 10/12/2025

## 1. Acceptance of Terms

By downloading, installing, or using Proactive Lab ("the Application"), provided by EARTH'S DREAMS S.R.L. ("the Company"), the user agrees to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, do not use the Application.

## 2. License to Use

The Company grants the user a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the Application exclusively for personal and non-commercial purposes, in accordance with these Terms. It is forbidden to decompile, disassemble, reverse engineer, or attempt to derive the source code of the Application.

## 3. Access Models, Subscriptions, and Payments

The Application adopts a "Freemium" model. Some basic features are free and always active. Advanced features ("Premium") are visible within the app but appear locked or blurred until the user completes the purchase.

### A. Unlocking Methods:
The user can unlock Premium features through one of the following methods (depending on the offer active at the time of purchase):
*   **Subscription:** Recurring payment (e.g., monthly or annual) with automatic renewal.
*   **One-Time Purchase (Lifetime):** If available, a single payment granting lifetime access to Premium features, without expiration and without recurring fees.

### B. Payment Management:
All purchases are managed through your Apple ID (iOS) or Google Play (Android) account. Payment will be charged to the payment method associated with your Store account upon confirmation.

### C. Immediate Unlock (No Trial Period):
Unless otherwise specifically indicated as a promotion on the Store, the Application does **NOT** provide free trial periods. Premium features unlock immediately after payment confirmation. The user can evaluate the utility of Premium functions by consulting descriptions and previews in the app before purchase.

### D. Automatic Renewal (Subscriptions Only):
In the case of a recurring subscription, it renews automatically at the end of each billing period, unless auto-renewal is turned off in Store account settings at least 24 hours before expiration.

### E. Cancellation and Termination:
*   **For Subscriptions:** You can cancel auto-renewal at any time from your Apple or Google account settings. Termination will take effect at the end of the current billing period.
*   **For One-Time Purchase:** This purchase is final and requires no termination as it generates no future charges.

**Note:** Uninstalling the app does **NOT** automatically cancel an active subscription.

### F. Refunds:
Since payments are managed by stores, EARTH'S DREAMS S.R.L. does not have the technical ability to issue direct refunds. Refund requests must be submitted directly to Apple or Google according to their current policies.

## 4. Medical Disclaimer

**THE APPLICATION IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.**
The Application and integrated Artificial Intelligence services provide information for educational and informational purposes only.

*   **No Diagnosis:** The app does not perform diagnoses, prescribe treatments, and does not replace the doctor-patient relationship.
*   **Verification:** The user acknowledges that Artificial Intelligence is subject to errors, inaccuracies, or "hallucinations". It is the user's sole responsibility to verify any information generated by the app with a qualified doctor.
*   **Emergencies:** Do not use this app in medical emergency situations. In case of emergency, immediately contact 112, 911, or your local emergency number.

## 5. User Responsibility and Security

Since data resides locally on the device ("Offline-First"), the user is solely responsible for:
*   Physical custody of their device.
*   Setting lock codes, passwords, or biometric data to prevent unauthorized access to the App.
*   Performing backups of their data (if the feature is supported by the OS). The Company cannot recover data lost due to theft, loss, or damage to the device.

## 6. Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, EARTH'S DREAMS S.R.L. shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the Application, including, but not limited to, damages for loss of data or errors in AI-provided analyses.
The Company's total liability to the user shall not exceed the amount possibly paid by the user for the Application in the last 12 months.

## 7. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction

These Terms are governed by the laws of Romania, without prejudice to mandatory consumer protection rules of the user's country of residence. For any dispute, the court of the Company's registered office shall be competent, except for mandatory forums provided by consumer protection law.
